statements: SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'incoming' ORDER BY call_date DESC, call_duration ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT call_id, caller_id, receiver_id FROM call_logs WHERE call_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY call_duration DESC
SELECT DISTINCT caller_id, receiver_id FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id IS NOT NULL AND receiver_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT call_id, call_date FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 123 OR receiver_id = 456 ORDER BY call_date
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS average_duration, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'outgoing'
SELECT * FROM call_logs ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'incoming'
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration, call_date FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 123 AND receiver_id = 456 AND call_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(call_duration), MAX(call_duration), MIN(call_duration) FROM call_logs
SELECT * FROM call_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT caller_number, call_duration FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) FROM call_logs;
SELECT DISTINCT receiver_number FROM call_logs;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE caller_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT call_id, caller_number FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT receiver_number FROM call_logs WHERE call_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS average_duration FROM call_logs;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT pattern_description, pattern_type FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'malicious';
SELECT call_start, call_end, call_duration, call_type FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > INTERVAL '5 minutes';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password = 'securePassword';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'emergency' ORDER BY call_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM calls
SELECT call_id, call_datetime FROM calls
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT * FROM suspicious_calls ORDER BY report_datetime DESC
SELECT log_text, log_datetime FROM call_logs WHERE call_id = 100
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com'
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT users.username, calls.call_datetime FROM users JOIN calls ON users.user_id = calls.caller_id WHERE calls.call_duration > 300 ORDER BY calls.call_datetime ASC

SELECT u.username, c.call_datetime, l.log_text FROM users u JOIN calls c ON u.user_id = c.caller_id JOIN call_logs l ON c.call_id = l.call_id WHERE l.log_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY c.call_datetime DESC, l.log_datetime ASC

SELECT DISTINCT u.username, c.call_datetime, s.reason FROM users u JOIN calls c ON u.user_id = c.caller_id JOIN suspicious_calls s ON c.call_id = s.call_id WHERE c.call_duration > 600 ORDER BY s.report_datetime ASC
SELECT * FROM call_logs;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_timestamp FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 123 AND receiver_id = 456;
SELECT call_id, caller_id, receiver_id FROM call_logs ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM call_logs ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM call_logs WHERE call_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT phone_number, is_verified FROM phone_numbers WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin');
SELECT * FROM suspicious_calls WHERE suspicious_score > 0.8 ORDER BY suspicious_score DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.call_duration, p.phone_number FROM users u JOIN call_logs c ON u.user_id = c.caller_id JOIN phone_numbers p ON u.user_id = p.user_id ORDER BY c.call_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
